Token.Abstract: Registers a block to receive KVO notifications for the specified key-path relative to the receiver.
Token.Declaration: - (void)addObserverBlockForKeyPath:(NSString *)keyPath block:(void ( ^ ) ( id _Nonnull obj , id _Nonnull oldVal , id _Nonnull newVal ))block

Parameter.Name: keyPath
Parameter.Abstract: The key path, relative to the receiver, of the property to observe. This value must not be nil.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: The block to register for KVO notifications.

Token.Abstract: Stops all blocks (associated by addObserverBlockForKeyPath:block: from receiving change notifications for the property specified by a given key-path relative to the receiver, and release these blocks.

Parameter.Name: keyPath
Parameter.Abstract: A key-path, relative to the receiver, for which blocks is registered to receive KVO change notifications.

Token.Abstract: Stops all blocks (associated by addObserverBlockForKeyPath:block: from receiving change notifications, and release these blocks.
